laboratory_examinations.findings: >182 WBC, 1 epi, Large Leuk, Negative Nitrite, Moderate Bacteria

laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Subsequent UCx showed Proteus mirabilis >100,000 organisms/mL that was sensitive to Ampicillin.

laboratory_examinations.findings: BUN 50, Cr 3.1 (baseline fluctuating in previous 2 months), Ca 8.1, Phos 4.9, Bicarb 18 (AG 14), Lactate 1.9
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Creatinine level of 3.1 suggests worsening renal function.

laboratory_examinations.findings: WBC within normal limits, but differential showed 81% PMN, 10% Lymphocytes
Shasta toxin not found (test for C. difficile) - NO SALMONELLA OR SHIGELLA FOUND.
